description:
Enter a labyrinthine nightmare where reality bends and sanity crumbles. In ESCAPE - BACKROOMS HORROR, navigate an endless maze of damp carpets and flickering lights. No two corners are the same, and the deeper you venture, the more twisted the Backrooms become.

Key Features:
	•	Endless Terror: Explore an ever-shifting labyrinth with terrifying environments, facing unknown horrors at every turn.
	•	Haunting Encounters: As a single-player horror survival game, it places you in a maze of rooms and hallways filled with terrifying creatures. Hide from or confront these threats as you navigate the maze.
	•	Suffocating Dread: Experience relentless horror amplified by chilling sounds and eerie lighting.
	•	First-Person Perspective: Immerse yourself in a terrifying survival horror environment from a first-person view.
	•	Diverse Locations: Discover and survive through a dozen unique rooms, each presenting new challenges and fears.
	•	Camcorder Feature: Use your camcorder to capture and review the horrors you encounter, adding a strategic layer to your survival.

Can you escape this endless nightmare?
name: ESCAPE - BACKROOMS HORROR
